title: Yoga Mat
slogan: Eco-friendly with non-slip and durable TPE
description: Yoga is a great way to relax and connect with your body. But if you are trying to get the most out of your stretches, performing them on bare flooring can be painful when your hands, knees and vertebrae press into the ground. Our Yoga Mat instantly adds comfort and support to your fitness routine, regardless of where you like to workout!

title: Bath bomb Spearmint
slogan: Enjoy Spa quality experience in the comfort of your home
description: Bath bombs are made fresh by hand in the united states with love. Each gift set is made fresh to order. Multi Use - Unisex Bath Bombs, suitable for Foot, Tub and Jacuzzi Spa relaxation. Make your bath tub explode with bubbles. Wonderful Spearmint scent

title: Bluetooth Speaker - Yellow
description: Waterproof design can make the speaker used when you take shower or go outing. Works with most of Bluetooth enabled devices, such as mobile phones, tablets, computers, etc. Comes with a built-in rechargeable battery. Color: Orange

title: Yoga Blocks
slogan: Great way to improve your Yoga poses
description: Yoga blocks provide gentle support adjust and perfect your positions. Provides stability and balance to help with optimal alignment, deeper poses and increased strength. Large enough to sit on comfortably. Made from durable, supportive foam.

reviews.name: Shannon
reviews.comment: Great way to imporove your favorite yoga pose

title: Yoga Combo Kit
description: Everything you need to get started with Yoga. Our durable and stable yoga mat bundled with a yoga block. You will be doing perfect Yoga poses with this combo kit.
